channel.title: Throphy Menu
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Throphy Menu" - what happen with yours throphy for last season ?

item.title: Re: THROPHY MENU
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Re: THROPHY MENU
item.content:encoded:
For two weeks directly after the recode there was a button that would basically check every trophy (except the r00t trophies since they didn't exist yet) and see if you qualified for it. It was removed because it was extremely server intensive (this was before the new server), slightly buggy (I got Hanging with Eleven despite the fact that I was only season 3), and only meant to retroactively award you with what you earned pre-recode.

After you loop, you should get a whole messload of trophies. They won't show up in the loop mission until after you actually loop.

item.title: Re: THROPHY MENU
item.content:encoded:
just a sample.

item.title: Re: THROPHY MENU
item.content:encoded: All you have to do is loop to get them

item.title: THROPHY MENU
item.content:encoded: i am already at season 3, and i will going to season 4 soon, but none of my throphy list open. what happen to all my throphy at least from 2 last season ???
